name: Garlic Pepper Salmon Belly
description: Indulge in the flavors of the sea with this Garlic Pepper Salmon Belly recipe. Perfect for those following a low-carb and low-sugar diet, this dish is not only healthy but also packed with the goodness of omega-3 fatty acids. Elevate your mealtime with a recipe that prioritizes your health without compromising on taste.

recipeInstructions.text: Prep the ingredients: Mince the garlic and season the salmon belly with salt and ground pepper on all sides.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a non-stick skillet over medium-high heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the salmon belly, skin-side down first, for about 3-4 minutes until the skin is crispy.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Flip the salmon and add the minced garlic to the skillet, cooking for an additional 3-4 minutes until the salmon is golden and cooked through.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4
